spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Area 2 - Dam Exterior - Dam Exterior
Area 4 - Central Caves - Transport to Area 5 Tower Lobby
Area 8 - Shaft East
spoiler_log.Ice Beam: Area 3 - Factory Interior - Transport to Area 3 Metroid Caverns
spoiler_log.Lightning Armor: Area 2 - Dam Entryway - Transport to Area 2 Dam Exterior
spoiler_log.Beam Burst: Area 4 - Crystal Mines - Super Missile Room
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Shaft East
Area 4 - Crystal Mines - Diggernaut Chase Room
spoiler_log.Progressive Jump:
Area 1 - Ice Beam Chamber
Area 2 - Dam Entryway - Transport to Area 2 Dam Exterior
spoiler_log.Aeion Reserve Tank: Area 3 - Metroid Caverns - Transport to Area 3 Factory Exterior (Upper)
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 2: Area 1 - Metroid Caverns Alpha Arena South West
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 6: Area 4 - Central Caves - Gamma Arena Room 1
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 8: Area 2 - Dam Exterior - Inner Alpha Arena

hints.text: A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 2 - Dam Exterior.
The Baby Metroid can be found in Area 2 - Dam Interior.
A Progressive Jump can be found in Area 2 - Dam Entryway.
A Progressive Jump can be found in Area 1.
The Beam Burst can be found in Area 4 - Crystal Mines.
The Super Missile Launcher can be found in Area 3 - Factory Exterior.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 4 - Central Caves.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 8.
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 3 - Metroid Caverns.
An Energy Tank can be found in Area 3 - Factory Interior.
